entries.title: ChatGPT
entries.description: Trained model called ChatGPT which interacts in a conversational way. The dialogue format makes it possible for ChatGPT to answer followup questions, admit its mistakes, challenge incorrect premises, and reject inappropriate requests. ChatGPT is a sibling model to InstructGPT, which is trained to follow an instruction in a prompt and provide a detailed response.

entries.title: Jenkins CI/CD

Poetry comes with all the tools you might need to manage your projects in a deterministic way.

Python is a programming language that lets you work quickly

entries.title: tox
entries.description:
For running tests as regular we already got frameworks like pytest which work perfectly fine. The reason tox is interesting is that it creates temporary environments to run tests in them. This allows to not only test against the currently installed Python version, but to multiple ones as specified. That's particularly helpful for developing libraries which got more than a single set of interpreter+dependency combinations to support.

 (Recommended by IA)

entries.title: Hexagonal Architecture
entries.description: Create your application to work without either a UI or a database so you can run automated regression-tests against the application, work when the database becomes unavailable, and link applications together without any user involvement.

entries.title: InnerSource Patterns
entries.description: InnerSource is a software development strategy rapidly spreading throughout large corporationsâ€”and it is also more. At its essence, InnerSource enables software developers to contribute to the efforts of other teams, fostering transparency and openness to contributions from others. But beyond that, InnerSource represents a collaborative and empowering way of involving employees in making and implementing decisions throughout the corporation. It embodies a philosophy of human relations, an approach to rewards and motivations, and a loose, adaptable set of tools and practices.

entries.title: Apache Kafka
entries.description: Apache Kafka is an open-source distributed event streaming platform used by thousands of companies for high-performance data pipelines, streaming analytics, data integration, and mission-critical applications.
